title: Creamy bacon and clam chowder
ingredients: ['4 rashers streaky bacon', '80g chopped onion', '4 potatoes, peeled and cubed', '1 tablespoon plain flour', '250ml fish stock', '250ml single cream', '1 1/4 (280g) tins baby clams, chopped and juice reserved', 'salt and pepper to taste', '125ml double cream', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley']
